Pre-Game Insights: France and Italy are facing each other for the first time in the UEFA Nations League â€“ Group A.
The most recent confrontation took place in a friendly in 2018, which France won 3-1 at home in Nice.
Both teams participated this year in Euro 2024 where they managed to get out of the groups.
Others: France was considered the main favorite to win Euro 2024 but stopped in the semifinals, being eliminated by Spain, score 2-1.
Italy also participated in Euro 2024 but had an evolution below expectations even though it was the European champion en-titre.
Didier Dechamps remained as coach to qualify the team for the 2026 World Cup.
Luciano Spalletti was reconfirmed as coach and hopes to qualify the national team for the 2026 World Cup.
